Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI gives more thoughtful explanative responses whereas teachers just kind of give empty hollow responses that are basically just my question rephrased back at me, if a response at all

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is responsive and helpful whereas the teachers are generally unresponsive (3-4 day wait for response to a question) and dismissive

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI responses i have to take with a grain of salt whereas teacher responses i can know (or hope) its completely relevant to the learning content
